## Form.setView() method

Replace the HTML. Change everything, delete all blocks and create new etc

**Signature:**

```typescript
setView(page: string | HTMLElement): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | string \| HTMLElement | The new HTML page or element to set. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A promise that resolves once the view has been set successfully. The promise is rejected if validation fails before setting the view.
